referenceObject.reference: Ferreira, R. L., Souza, M. F. V. R., Machado, E. O. & Brescovit, A. D. (2011). Description of a new Eukoenenia (Palpigradi: Eukoeneniidae) and Metagonia (Araneae: Pholcidae) from Brazilian caves, with notes on their ecological interactions. Journal of Arachnology 39: 409-419.
